channel.title: Help with Castle Wars
channel.description:
I coded Castle Wars. It works very well but I can't attack in it. How can I make it so when you attack someone and the person die, the person returns to his base (Zamorak or Saradomin) and don't lose stuff like Wildy.
Thanks if you help.

item.title: Help with Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Ahh, I never made this. Could you help me with it please ?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You have to either make the boolean return true or false(depending on the method) for the area to determine if you are in the wilderness or not. Then you need to add a few else-if statements to the youdied() method.

Read full topic
